items.question: How long does setup take?
items.answer: Best case — from 1 day. Depends on your process and available access.

items.question: What's needed to start?
items.answer: Be a Kaspi Pay client. Cash register account needed for receipt automation.

items.question: Does this work for Instagram/Telegram sales?
items.answer: Yes. AiPay covers invoice → payment → confirmation and you can connect bot/CRM/delivery via API.

items.question: Can AiPay withdraw money or "take access"?
items.answer: No. We don't manage money withdrawal and don't make outgoing transfers.

items.question: Are custom integrations available?
items.answer: Yes. If you need to embed AiPay into site/CRM/bot — we do it per specification (paid).

items.question: What if payment "didn't match"?
items.answer: Such cases go to "exceptions": you see them in Dashboard and resolve quickly.
